meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>resident</kanji> <kanji>detain</kanji>ed in a location who is in the <kanji>army</kanji> is a member of the <vocabulary>stationed troops</vocabulary> at this location. They could also be the <vocabulary>occupying troops</vocabulary> as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
